bug.summary: Error: it seems that PESQ is not installed.
bug.description: Dear all, I have successfully installed pesq with commands cd /home/dee/Documents/espnet/egs/chime4/asr1_multich/../../../tools && make pesq But I still got error like: Error: it seems that PESQ is not installed. Error: please install PESQ as follows. Error: cd /home/dee/Documents/espnet/egs/chime4/asr1_multich/../../../tools && make pesq when I run run.sh under egs/chime4/asr_multich, can someone help me how to solve this? Bests Dee
